pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"本镜像包含 RISC-V 常用工具与文档，分别以 Git 仓库与 Release 的形式镜像。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"git-仓库","children":"Git 仓库"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"本站提供了克隆脚本，以供克隆相关仓库与子模块。样例如下"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# riscv-gnu-toolchain 及其子模块
## 单独克隆
git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/git/riscv-collab/riscv-gnu-toolchain.git
## 同时克隆子模块，注意路径为 .git 替换为 .sh
curl -L {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/git/riscv-collab/riscv-gnu-toolchain.sh | bash
# rocket-tools 及其子模块
## 单独克隆
git {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/git/chipsalliance/rocket-tools.git
## 同时克隆子模块
curl -L {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/git/chipsalliance/rocket-tools.sh | bash","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"已有项目可以在"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/git/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"中浏览。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"release","children":"Release"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"镜像站提供了标准文档和预编译工具链的镜像，例如"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# RISC-V 非特权与特权指令集文档
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/release/riscv/riscv-isa-manual/
# RISC-V 向量扩展指令集文档
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/release/riscv/riscv-v-spec/
# 预编译 riscv-gnu-toolchain
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/release/riscv-collab/riscv-gnu-toolchain/LatestRelease/","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"已有项目可以在"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/release/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"中浏览。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"添加镜像","children":"添加镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["目前该同步脚本（暂时）维护在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/tuna/tunasync-scripts/blob/for-iscas/riscv-toolchains.sh","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://github.com/tuna/tunasync-scripts/blob/for-iscas/riscv-toolchains.sh"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在后续的维护中，您可以通过 PR 添加新的镜像。"}]]}]

meta.title: RISC-V 工具链镜像使用帮助
